compliances.title: Sensitive information provided in environment variables
compliances.cause: The environment variables DD_CELERY_BROKER_PASSWORD,DD_DATABASE_PASSWORD,DD_SECRET_KEY contain sensitive data

vulnerabilities.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the ALGnew function in block_templace.c in Python Cryptography Toolkit (aka pycrypto) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code as demonstrated by a crafted iv parameter to cryptmsg.py.
